title: Circle's Radius
text: Find the radius of the circle equation.
speech: Find the radius of the circle equation.

title: c
text: The value of c in circle equations of $$a^2+b^2=c^2$$ is the radius. For $$x^2+y^2=1$$, what is c and the radius equal to?
speech: The value of c in circle equations of  a squared plus b squared, is equal to, c squared  is the radius. For  x squared, plus y squared is equal to 1 , what is c and the radius equal to?

title: End of the Domain
text: At the end of the circle's radius is also the end of the domain.
speech: At the end of the circle's radius is also the end of the domain.

title: Right endpoint
